body: LEAD: Banks can be patient. In the Greenpoint section of Brooklyn, the East New York Savings bank has been operating a new branch for a year and a half in a former lingerie shop without putting in a new storefront. body: LEAD: Since the turn of the century, a jute factory has stood at 376 President Street, between Bond and Hoyt Streets, in a brownstone neighborhood of Brooklyn that in the last two decades has come to be known as Carroll Gardens. The gentrifying area has a historic district, and the factory, in recent years used for furniture making, lies just
title: POSTINGS: Carroll Gardens Conversion; The 55-Unit Mill

body: LEAD: With an unusually large number of homes for sale and buyers insisting on bargains, a consensus has emerged among economists and real estate professionals that prices in the New York metropolitan region will increase little, if at all, for the rest of the decade. body: LEAD: When the Atlantic Emblem steamed into New York harbor from Japan Friday, crews unloaded her cargo of 10 new Kawasaki subway cars at the Red Hook Marine Terminal in Brooklyn, the last major cargo handling operation on New York's waterfront. body: LEAD: GOING Hollywood was never Gilberto Godoy's dream. GOING Hollywood was never Gilberto Godoy's dream. But then Hollywood came to him, in his tiny Brooklyn bakery, and his life has suddenly taken a turn for the glamorous. Customers greet Mr. Godoy with ''We saw you in the movie'' and ask for autographs on bread bags. Agents call with offers to
title: The Best Supporting Baker?
